title.bibl: Revyen, Jan. 1, 1910. [Danish Cultural Institutions in the United States Aided by Homeland]

div.bibl: Revyen, Jan. 1, 1910. [DANISH CULTURAL INSTITUTIONS IN THE UNITED STATES AIDED BY HOMELAND]

body.p: The Danish Government granted 13,500 Kroner for the advancement of Danish culture among Danes in foreign countries. This sum was distributed in the following manner:
For schools and education: Danish schools received 6,500 Kroner, and of this sum 4,000 Kroner went to schools and colleges in the United States.
For Danish books and libraries: 3,000 Kroner, of which 1,100 Kroner went to Danish libraries in the United States.
For Professor Paul Verrior, professor of Scandinavian languages at the University of Paris: 1,000 Kroner.
